alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 01 at 9:13PM EDT until July 01 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHERN SULLIVAN COUNTY... At 913 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated 2 to 3 inches of rain have fallen in the warned area over the past 2 hours. Rainfall intensity has lessened but flooding or flash flooding may still be ongoing. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, county roads, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sullivan, Shelburn, Farmersburg, Hymera, Fairbanks, Merom, Graysville and Turtle Creek Reservoir. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
